anathema: Abandon your post, fail to protect your charge, willingly suffer corruption over death or grievous harm
edict: Protect holy people, places, and treasures; sacrifice common comforts and mortal joys for the sake of your charge
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Vineshvakhi (The Pain of Purity)](/Deities.aspx?ID=622)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 232

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Protect holy people, places, and treasures; sacrifice common comforts and mortal joys for the sake of your charge

**Anathema** Abandon your post, fail to protect your charge, willingly suffer corruption over death or grievous harm

**Area of Concern**
Guardians, locks, sacrifice, vaults

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Constitution or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40)

**Favored Weapon** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=386)

**Domains** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=108), [Lightning](/Domains.aspx?ID=111), [Pain](/Domains.aspx?ID=87), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=80), [Secrecy](/Domains.aspx?ID=91)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Leaden Steps](/Spells.aspx?ID=2005)

- **2nd**
[Enlarge](/Spells.aspx?ID=1514)

- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=1462)

</column>
name: Vineshvakhi (The Pain of Purity)
religious_symbol: Trident with a lock in its head
